name: Monoometry
description:
This is a Simple Arcade Shooter and a Highscore System.

You can move Horizontally Using the Keys: [A] and [D].

The Mechanics are Simple, You move Left and Right Dodging the walls that are Randomly Generated, while You Continue, Enemies are Randomly Created on the Map and they are Heading Towards You!. There are 2 Types of Enemies, The Dark and the Clear. To be Able to Eliminate them You have to Know this:

With the Left Click you Shoot a White Bullet (with this you can kill the white enemy). With the Right Click you Shoot a Gray Bullet (with this you can kill the gray enemy).

The Difficulty of the Game (Speed), Increases Gradually with the Number of Enemies Killed. You only have 5 Lives to play.

This Game Was Created in 7:19 Hours, For the Challenge: Make a Arcade Shooter in 12 Hours. Submitted by: Jake Parker.

I started developing it at 3:45 PM. And I Finished them Completely at: 10:24 PM
